alps.doc: The Todo API is an example format for serving todos to all those JavaScript ToDoMVC applications. EXPERIMENTAL! This API definition is not complete. It is currently being fitted to working examples. It is not intended to be published, used, or submitted to any API-collection hubs in its current form.

descriptor.doc: A container for a todo item, which represents a task that a user has identified as needing completion.
A short description of the todo item. See the schema.org Thing property "description."
A representation of the status of the todo item. An atomic value such as "completed" or "incomplete".
